metadata.name: Capabilities Discovery - Linux
metadata.comment: Detects usage of "getcap" binary. This is often used during recon activity to determine potential binaries that can be abused as GTFOBins or other.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/getcap')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -r ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /r ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –r ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —r ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―r '))))

output.summary: Detects usage of "getcap" binary. This is often used during recon activity to determine potential binaries that can be abused as GTFOBins or other.
